derivation.yuyuan_name: from Hindi khichṛī, from Sanskrit khiccā, a dish of rice and sesame

entry.def: Kedgeree is a cooked dish consisting of rice, fish, and eggs.

means.word_mean: 1. a dish of rice and hard-boiled eggs and cooked flaked fish

auth_sentence.content: A dozen meat and fish dishes and that ne plus ultra of my childhood, kedgeree.
auth_sentence.res_content: A dozen meat and fish dishes and that ne plus ultra of my childhood, kedgeree.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A dozen meat and fish dishes and that ne plus ultra of my childhood, kedgeree.

auth_sentence.content: To serve, place a few generous spoonfuls of kedgeree into bowls and garnish with a little freshly grated nutmeg.
